body.p: Perform the following steps to set the environment for the administrator:

ol.li: Extract the LDK kit tar file to the desired UNIX directory, and then define the environment variable $INTEL_LDK to point to the installation location for lab users.
Make that path read-only for lab users (recommended).
Prepare tool environment setup instructions for designers. Refer to the tools specified in CAD tools.
Inform users to set the environment variable $INTEL_LDK to point to the original LDK read-only content. setenv INTEL_LDK <LDK installation directory>
Inform users that the LDK training labs require about 10 GB of disk space for each user.
If possible, prepare workspace disk area for designers.
